channel.title: Miro, scaring old people since 2003
channel.description:
[code]You: 24 male. Stranger: 102 f You: WOOOOAAAAH You: thats REALLY old. You: old bat. dieing tonight? You: there is no heavan You: when you die your mind goes blank You: you dont think You: you stop existing. Stranger: i beleive in god You: you would, but then you dont see the scamming the churches are doing. You: the science thats develuping You: the "religion" thats holding down curing of cancer, aids and other desieces. You: Religion is a way to scare the public into behaving. You: its worked and become a custom You: but now people who have no religion are going to win over the world. Stranger: U AINT GON CHANGE MY MIND I <3 CHRIST You: Before medicin and science, you would have died 60 years ago. Stranger: NO shutup[/code]
LOLOLOL!

item.title: Miro, scaring old people since 2003
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

medicine*.

its funny how trolling makes the people of BOTH sides look stupid. just saying

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:415818”]I thought you meant Miro:
http://www.getmiro.com/
And I was confused, because it hasn’t been around since 2003.[/quote]
my name is miro >:O

item.title: Miro, scaring old people since 2003
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:415818”]The joke is you think the person is actually 102[/quote] You never know in these situations, so its better to troll a person at any age.

the joke is i got him/her all mad about jesus.
